document_data.name: Zallara
document_data.Description: Zallara had black skin and very long, flowing white hair.
document_data.Personality: Like other followers of Eilistraee, Zallara was good-natured and wanted to aid her race in peacefully returning to the surface of [[Toril]].
document_data.Activities: She participated in moonlit rituals such as [[Church of Eilistraee#Rituals|High Hunt]] and [[Church of Eilistraee#Rituals|Circle of Song]].
